Biomass per capita calculated as insect biomass over total number of adult females
====================

```{r stats}

FullModel <- lmer(log10_BiomsPerAdFm ~ log10AdFm + (1|ColonyID) + (1|Date), data = Biomass, REML = FALSE)
RedModel <- lmer(log10_BiomsPerAdFm ~ (1|ColonyID) + (1|Date), data = Biomass, REML = FALSE)
anova(FullModel)
anova(RedModel, FullModel)

```



```{r Graph, fig.height=7, fig.width=10}

plot <- ggplot(data = Biomass, aes(x = log10AdFm, y = log10_BiomsPerAdFm)) + geom_point()
plot <- plot + xlab("Nest size - number of adult females") + ylab("Prey biomass per adult female") + mytheme

Vis_fit <- (visreg(model, "log10AdFm", plot = FALSE))$fit						
plot <- plot +  geom_line(data = Vis_fit, aes(x = log10AdFm, y= visregFit))
plot

```
